main event: A single unidentified object with a trailing smoke-like exhaust was observed in Yuma, Arizona, on 20 May 1955.
interesting points: The object trailed smoke for several seconds before disappearing,The observation was classified as possible meteor,The sighting occurred in a clear sky with good visibility,The document indicates a ground-visual observation type,The object was seen for a very short duration of time.
sighted object: one object with trailing smoke-like exhaust
witness description: civilian, observed for a short duration
